Hairbrush as a tool for organizing small items: Use the bristles to pick up and sort small objects such as beads, buttons, or seeds.
Hairbrush as a plant marker: Write the name of the plant on the handle and use the hairbrush to mark where each plant is in the garden or indoor plants.
Hairbrush as a pet grooming tool: Use the hairbrush to detangle and groom the fur of pets like cats and dogs.
Hairbrush as a dusting tool: Use the hairbrush to dust hard-to-reach areas like the tops of bookshelves or ceiling fans.
Hairbrush as a makeup applicator: Use the bristles to apply makeup to the face, especially for reaching the corners of the eyes or the edges of the lips.
